pros: Company is investing in new technology that should help the staff in their daily work.    Comfortable trying new things and listening to employees suggestions.   I feel appreciated working here.
cons: Home Care is hard work and the regulations and procedures seem to change all the time.    You have to want to do what is best for the patients and be able to go with the changes as they occur.
